hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐾 I have soft fur.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail! Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play fetch.
🏡 I protect your house.

animal.question: I say 'Moo'! I give you milk. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass.
🐄 I am big and often black and white.
🥛 People drink what I make.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have a wide beak.
💧 I love playing in water.
🥚 Babies hatch from my eggs.

animal.question: I go 'Neigh'! I can give you a ride! What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I wear horseshoes.
🥕 I like to eat carrots.
🌾 I live on a farm.

animal.question: I am green and hop! I say 'Ribbit, ribbit'. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I live near the water.
🐛 I eat bugs.
👅 I catch bugs with my long tongue.

animal.question: I roar very loudly and I'm the king of the jungle! What am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I have a big mane.
🐾 I am a very big cat.
🥩 I like to eat meat.

animal.question: I'm big and grey and I have a trunk! What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I live in Africa and Asia.
🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🚿 I use my trunk to spray water on myself.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes! What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I look a little bit like a horse.
🌱 I eat grass on the plains of Africa.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 My stripes help me to camouflage in a group.

animal.question: I fly high in the sky and say 'Caw Caw'! What am I?

hints.text: 🪶 I have black feathers.
🌽 I like to eat corn.
⚫ I am usually seen during the day.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I'm short and soft.
🐄 Animals eat me in the field.
⚽ You can play on me!

plant.question: I have a long stem and a colorful head. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I smell very sweet
🎨 I come in many different colors
💐 You can give me as a gift

plant.question: I am big and tall and have many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I have a thick trunk.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.

plant.question: I am long and orange and crunchy. Bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I'm orange and grow underground.
🐰 Rabbits like to munch on me.
🥗 You can eat me in a salad.

plant.question: I grow on a vine and am round and juicy. You can make juice out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I can be green or purple.
🍷 People use me to make a special drink.
🧺 I grow in bunches

plant.question: I am a tall plant that grows a popular yellow vegetable. You can eat me on the cob. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I have yellow seeds.
🚜 Farmers grow lots of me.
🍿 You can pop me into a yummy snack!

plant.question: I am a root that is orange and sweet. You can make pie from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍠 I am not a potato, but look similar
🥧 I am delicious in a pie for Thanksgiving
🧡 I am the same color as an orange.

plant.question: I am a prickly plant that grows in the desert. I store water inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵I can survive with very little water
🏜️ I am mostly found in hot, dry places.
⚠️ Be careful, I have sharp needles.

plant.question: I am a seed that makes a yummy treat when popped with heat. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 You can put butter and salt on me.
🎬 I am delicious at the movies.
🟡 I'm small and yellow before being cooked.

plant.question: I am a green leafy vegetable that is used to make salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I am full of vitamins!
🥗 You might put dressing on me.
🐢 Tortoises love to eat me!
